headline: This Week In Pennsylvania: Dave McCormick & the latest Pa. news
author: James Wesser
sentences: In this week’s episode, Owens will talk about how Republicans are frustrated by the new congressional map, as well as how standardized test scores are low across the state.
(WHTM) — In This Week in Pennsylvania, Dennis Owens reports the latest in Pa. policy and politics.
Analysts Danielle Gross and Christopher Nicholas will then join in on the conversation.
He will also speak on what is being done to fix the unemployment compensation system.
He will then talk to a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate Dave McCormick.
